name: Get Duncan Home
description:
Duncan needs to get home. He's got his BSNS103 exam early tomorrow and his parents won't be happy if he fails it three times in a row. Duncan's mate has also pulled his red card, and now Duncan has three flat parties to attend before he can go home. Can you get him home before he loses his buzz?

Dunners stunner simulator set on Castle Street in Dunedin, New Zealand.

Programming - Seth Corbett-Davies and Dylan Pringle

Art - Dylan Pringle and Megan Thixton

Music - Dylan Pringle and Megan Thixton
